title: 09/07/21 DPS Hour 2 Jalen Hurts
itunes:title: 09/07/21 DPS Hour 2 Jalen Hurts
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Jalen Hurts hops on the program to chat about Alabama head football coach Nick Saban, leaving Alabama for Oklahoma and life as a young quarterback in the NFL. Plus, country music star Darius Rucker joins to share his worst betting beat of all time and why he's a Miami Dolphins fan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
